https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j1UYyOm5H3fJjuL8J0nXNXgSyk9.jpg Darya has escaped life as a vampire bride to a desert town of bright lights and casinos but Jure tracks her down and makes himself at home amongst the gamblers and drunks. As the bodies pile up, the law comes for them, forcing a clash of modern forces against immortals from a dying era. Blood From Stone
